dialogue.text: How are you feeling?
You ever just think about phones?
Well, I guess that answers that question.
No, seriously. I can just, like...press this glass in the right spots and then suddenly know more about bees.
Who comes up with this stuff?
I can’t tell if you’re so overtired that you’re acting high or if you’re just...you know, literally high.
I wanna take a nap.
I can barely even remember what happened during the costume thing.
Yeah. Well, Io did say that short term memory loss can be a side effect. But hey, at least you’re not puking your brains out all over the carpet.
Where’d Sensei go? I wanna talk to him again now that I don’t have to keep sayin’ all those weird buzzwords anymore.
He followed a dolphin outside last I saw.
A dolphin? Maybe I really am high.
I’m sure he’ll be back soon. It’s not like him to stay away from an entire room full of girls trying to get into his pants.
I ain’t been followin’ the tally, but I hope my team wins...I miss the good old days when there were only ten of us fightin’ over Sensei’s pants.
Are you officially a part of that fight now?
Dunno what you’re talkin’ about.
I’m asking if you have feelings for him or not. Like, real feelings. Not just pubescent curiosities.
Pubescial what now?
When you see him...how does it make your heart feel? Is it like when you’re playing soccer? Watching a horror movie? Or is it more like...I don’t know. When you’re watching porn or something?
Maki says I can’t watch that stuff.
But if I had to compare it to somethin’...
I’d say it’s closest to wakin’ up from a really nice dream.
Ain’t so much racin’ as it is feelin’ comfortable.
All's I know is that I ain’t ever felt this way ‘bout anyone before. And that I get now why Makoto’s liked him for so long.
Do you think I’ll ever feel that way about someone?
That sounds nice...comfort, I mean. Being able to just be with somebody without being tempted to {i}do things{/i} with that person.
I don’t know. Maybe I really am just a thirsty bitch at the end of the day. But I can’t help but feel a little jealous when other people know what they want.
Hey. Wake up.
Huh? Were you sayin’ somethin’ just now?
Hah...This is what I get for opening myself up for a second.
Kirin, you’ve been open for business since the day I met you.
Not like that, Miku.
Let’s just hurry up and get you back to the hotel before anyone realizes that you’re drugged up.
Kaaaay...I’m gonna sleep like a rock, so I’m trustin’ you to not do anythin’ weird to me.
Does taking your makeup off count as weird? Because I wouldn’t be able to live with myself if I let you fall asleep with all of that on.
Just don’t touch my ears. I’m weak there.
Well, now I {i}have{/i} to...
I make my way back into the bar after miraculously avoiding what was sure to be my hardest decision of the weekend.
This means that, fortunately no one had their heart broken or felt betrayed by me tonight.
This also means that, unfortunately, my chances of getting laid on Christmas have greatly decreased.
But if there is anything I know about my likelihood of getting laid, it is that it’s never 0%%.
And that’s good enough for me.
Hey. How much do you love me?
Zero.
Good. But how much do you love Miku?
I don’t know. Slightly more than zero?
Great, because we need your help with something.
I am assuming it’s something that’s going to take me away from the party?
And you would be correct in assuming that, yes.
Yeah. That’s how most parties seem to end for me nowadays.
What is it? What do you need help with?
Io gave Miku a Valium and now Miku is about to pass out.
This sounds like a job for Makoto.
Sensei, come on. Do you really want to bother Makoto with this after all she’s been through lately? I can handle it.
I just need your help carrying her back to the hotel. Or at least the Uber that will take us to the hotel. But you know what I mean.
Wait, why did Miku take some of Io’s medication in the first place?
I can’t remember. But I’m sure glad I did.
You ever just think of phones before, Sensei?
Why did you let this happen?
Doesn’t matter. Are you in or not?
Phones are like...they put all of the knowledge in the world inside a little box that you have to put {i}another{/i} little box on top of to protect it.
Yeah, I should probably help.
Okay then! On that note, let’s go wait outside. It’s way too stuffy in here and I need some fresh air anyway.
I should probably at least say bye to-
And risk getting stopped? No way. We have to do this now.
I really don’t think another two minutes will-
Ugh...pathetic. Aren’t you supposed to be a {i}man?{/i} Why don’t you just act like one?
By submitting to everything Kirin wants from me?
Obvs by escorting these...two lovely ladies back to the hotel, loser. I can’t believe I had to spell it out for you. Hilarious.
So? Are we good? Can we go?
Yeah...fine. Whatever. Just lead the way.
{i}Thank you, Sensei! You’re so- Miku, watch your foot. There’s a drop- okay. You’re on the ground now.{/i}
{i}Ugh...can you believe the construction around here? It’s like...so outdated. {/i}
Hah...
Ah...
You too?
Yeah...
I see...
Maybe...nothing will happen?...
Yeah...
And maybe the sky will fall.
Nothing else happens when we return to the hotel.
But something almost does.
Instead of rushing Miku back to the girls’ room to make sure she gets her rest, Kirin suggests that we all go hang out in mine for a little while instead.
And for some reason, I don’t decline.
But halfway there, she changes her mind.
It doesn’t make me feel any better about myself.
But it {i}does{/i} make me feel better.
I collapse onto the bed and hide myself beneath the covers.
Before the darkness whisks me away, though...
I think about what could have been.
And mourn the idea of any body but mine beneath these covers as well.
Sleep comes shortly after I do.
You’ll never guess who I thought of.
